title: I don't get how moderation works here
body:
https://i.imgur.com/DGGjBnj.jpg[]

So you leave up a thread discussing black face, but when I post about how Chris Brown is a bad dude for punching Rihanna, I'm justifying Chris Brown punching Rihanna.

https://i.imgur.com/A4VyyzH.png[]

The modding here is all over the place. Truth be told, this is how it works, if you have a popular topic, you can break any rule you want. If it's not popular or they don't like your opinion, then they use the stupidest interpretation of the vaguest rules to remove your content. This kind of thing never happened with The Curator.
